chart_description: The 'Connection Tracker Searches' chart displays the number of times the netfilter kernel module performed a search through the connection tracker tables per second. This chart can help identify whether the system is experiencing an abnormal number of searches through the connection tracker tables.

dimension_descriptions.search_restart: The 'search_restart' dimension indicates the number of times the kernel module restarted a search through the connection tracker tables because the timestamp of the current search record was earlier than the timestamp of the previous search record. A high value indicates that there are frequent changes to the tracked connections or an overload in the connection tracker tables.
